DOC.brief_summary: This study examines the effect of an intervention consisting of dynamic circadian light and sound therapy, as well as systematic information on sleep pattern, agitated behavior and functioning level.
DOC.brief_title: Modified Environment for Agitation in Patients With TBI
DOC.criteria: Patients with moderate and severe Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI) Diagnosed with Glasgow Coma Score (GCS) lower than 13 Patients with psychiatric diagnose and not speaking danish
